Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
Enhance (5): Destroy an enemy follower or amulet instead.
Fanfare: Spellboost a follower in your hand 2 times.

Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Enhance (9): Summon an Arch Summoner Erasmus instead.
Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

evoData.description: Evolve: Put a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.

baseData.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Earth Rite: Draw 3 cards instead. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Put a random card with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon a Magic Illusionist.

evoData.description: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon an unevolved Magic Illusionist.

baseData.description:
Destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.
Draw a card if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Spellboost: Destroy a follower with 1 more defense.
Fanfare: Draw a card if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).

Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Venus
-Pollux
-Star Phoenix
-Castor
-Scorpius
-Andromeda
Earth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of those cards.
Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

evoData.description: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

baseData.description:
Draw a card.
Select a follower. It can't attack until the start of your next turn.
Return that follower to the player's hand instead if you have 20 cards or less in your deck.

evoData.description: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.

baseData.description:
Summon a Clay Golem. Give +1/+0 to all allied Clay Golems.
Earth Rite: Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venus, Pollux, Star Phoenix, Castor, Scorpius, or Andromeda.

evoData.description: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venus, Pollux, Star Phoenix, Castor, Scorpius, or Andromeda.

baseData.description:
If this card has been Spellboosted 5 times or less, summon a Clay Golem and a Scrap Golem.
If this card has been Spellboosted 6 to 11 times, summon a Guardian Golem and a Clay Golem.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times, summon an Ultimate Clay Golem and a Guardian Golem.
Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.

evoData.description: Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.

baseData.description:
Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, banish any enemy follower instead.
Draw a card.
Fanfare: Put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
Clash: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

evoData.description: (Same as the unevolved form.)

baseData.description: Fanfare: Summon a Clay Golem.
If you have at least 6 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Mysterian Whitewyrm or Mysterian Blackwyrm.
Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.

evoData.description: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysteria follower (excluding Owen, Knight of Mysteria) from your deck into your hand.

Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Insights into your hand, recover 2 play points, and then banish this amulet.

Fanfare: Discard a card with Spellboost from your hand. Then put a random card with Spellboost that originally costs more than the discarded card from your deck into your hand and Spellboost it X times. X equals the number of times the discarded card had been Spellboosted.
Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence.
Bane.

evoData.description:
Bane.
Evolve: Reveal a random Runecraft spell without Spellboost from your deck and put it into your hand. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of that spell.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Put a Cayman, Mysterian Butler into your hand.
Whenever you play another Machina card, draw a card.

evoData.description: (Same as the unevolved form.)

baseData.description: Fanfare: Put a Seal of Solomon into your hand and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Repair Mode into your hand.
Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, gain +2/+2.

Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain Rush and summon a Scrap Golem.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.

Rush.
Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied amulet destroyed this match into your hand. If the amulet is a Naterran Great Tree, gain +2/+2.

evoData.description: Rush.

baseData.description:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Charming Gentlemouse. Give +1/+1 to all allied Charming Gentlemice.
Enhance (8) - Summon 2 and give +2/+2 instead.
Enhance (10) - Summon 3 and give +3/+3 instead.
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.

evoData.description: Evolve: Change the cost of a random Repair Mode in your hand to 0.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

evoData.description:
Evolve: Earth Rite - Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Earth Rite (2) - Deal 4 damage instead.

baseData.description:
Each turn, when you play an amulet for:
-The first time, gain +1/+1.
-The second time, draw a card.
-The third time, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

evoData.description: (Same as the unevolved form.)

baseData.description:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Draw a card.
Summon a Clay Golem.

Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.

Return a card that costs 2 play points or less to the player's hand.
Draw a card.

Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
Enhance (6): Put 2 more into your hand.
Earth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Conjure Guardians in your hand.
Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.

Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower instead, and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Joycrafter Sammy.
Select a follower in your hand and put a copy of it into your hand.

Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of that card into your deck.
Put a Mysterian Missile and Mysterian Circle into your hand.

Summon a Paper Shikigami.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Demonic Shikigami instead.

Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Isabelle's Conjuration or Tetra's Mettle.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, instead put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever you play a Machina card, draw a card.
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Clay Golem or Zombie.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less and summon an allied copy of it. If another allied Earth Sigil amulet is in play, put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
